35 Sunday Dinner Ideas Starring Ground Beef

If you're looking for a stress-free way to get Sunday dinner on the table, these ground beef recipes are affordable and easy to make.

By
Mary Shannon Wells
Mary Shannon Wells
Mary Shannon is a Digital Editor and has been on the Southern Living team since 2017. She helps run the brand's social media accounts on Twitter, Instagram, Facebook, Snapchat, and TikTok, where she's happily behind the scenes. When she's not ruffling feathers with an etiquette poll via Instagram Stories, she's writing content for the website and assisting in various print projects like gift guides and home stories.
Southern Living's editorial guidelines
Published on August 28, 2025

Sunday dinner is one of the best times for families to come together and share a meal. Before another five hectic weekdays, you can relax, catch up on weekend stories, and enjoy a comforting meal. Ground beef is one of the easiest and most budget-friendly options for family dinner recipes, and ground beef recipes are famously kid-friendly (we're looking at you, burgers and tacos).

If you're looking for a stress-free way to get Sunday dinner on the table, these ground beef recipes are affordable and easy to make.

01 of 35

Cowboy Casserole

Requiring just 25 minutes of hands-on time, it's hard to imagine a more comforting Sunday supper than a casserole topped with tater tots.

Get The Recipe
02 of 35

Old-Fashioned Cabbage Rolls

We Southern-ized the Polish-inspired recipe with the addition of a bit of Creole seasoning and the holy trinity of Creole and Cajun cooking, bell pepper, onion, and celery. 

Get The Recipe
03 of 35

West Texas Chili

Everything's bigger in Texas, including the flavor bursting from this traditional Texas chili recipe. If your family likes bold flavors with heat, try this recipe out this Sunday.

Get The Recipe
04 of 35

Stuffed Pattypan Squash with Beef and Feta

This stuffed veggie recipe is pretty, healthy, and customizable. Swap beef for ground chicken or turkey, pattypan squash for zucchini or yellow squash, and white rice for brown rice, quinoa, barley, or faro.

Get The Recipe
05 of 35

Mini Meatloaves with Potatoes, Leeks, and Brussels Sprouts

This sheet-pan dinner feels way fancier than the 15 minutes of hands-on time it requires.

Get The Recipe
06 of 35

Chunky Vegetable Beef Soup

You don't have to wait through hours of simmering to enjoy a warm, comforting bowl of soup. This classic recipe is on the table in just 45 minutes. Make two batches and freeze one for unplanned nights ahead.

Get The Recipe
07 of 35

Sloppy Joe Casserole

The kids will request this hearty casserole recipe week after week, and it's so easy to make that you won't mind.

Get The Recipe
08 of 35

Beef Calzones

Instead of ordering pizza, try homemade calzones stuffed with all your favorite toppings instead.

Get The Recipe
09 of 35

Sheet Pan Nachos

Loaded with ground chuck and pinto beans, these hearty nachos can work as an appetizer for a crowd or a dinner for a family. Don't skip the fresh toppings like avocado and cilantro.

Get The Recipe
10 of 35

Easy Beef and Broccoli Stir Fry

Start the week with a veggie-packed main dish. Loaded with flavorful ingredients like ground chuck, soy sauce, and rice vinegar, this is a 20-minute supper your family won't soon forget.

Get The Recipe
11 of 35

Greek Meatballs with Cucumber-Yogurt Sauce and Rice

Meatballs are great for freezing to save for later, so don't hesitate to make an extra batch or two. Plus, these Greek meatballs, along with the yogurt sauce and rice, would be delicious stuffed in pitas for brown bag lunches during the week.

Get The Recipe
12 of 35

Extra Easy Lasagna

Lasagna is the king of Sunday dinners, and this recipe is the least stressful way to get it on the table. Seriously, you don't even have to cook the noodles.

Get The Recipe
13 of 35

Homestyle Ground Beef Casserole

Make this family-friendly casserole on Sunday night, and you'll be set with leftovers everyone will actually want to eat on a busy weeknight a few days later.

Get The Recipe
14 of 35

Instant Pot Chili Mac

Put your Instant Pot to work with this family staple that sure to have everyone asking for seconds.

Get The Recipe
15 of 35

Sloppy Joe Casserole with Dinner Rolls

As one editor put it, "Southerners will always have a soft spot for King's Hawaiian rolls." This one-skillet supper is a hearty new way to serve them to your family.

Get The Recipe
16 of 35

Ground Beef Vegetable Soup with Gnocchi

One five-star reviewer said that even her super picky family loved this soup recipe that takes 30 minutes from start to finish.

Get The Recipe
17 of 35

Fire-Roasted Tomato-and-Beef Rag

Our Test Kitchen created this recipe with a future busy version of you in mind. Its super easy to double and freeze to enjoy later.

Get The Recipe
18 of 35

Beefy Nacho Casserole

The problem with nachos is that the chips on the top get all the toppings, and youre left with a platter of plain tortilla chips. This fun casserole solves that issue, and everyone gets their own serving, so theres no fighting over the best chips.

Get The Recipe
19 of 35

Hamburger Stew

This really does remind me of my childhood comforting beef and vegetable soup. If you remember that from your childhood, you will definitely love this recipe, says Test Kitchen Pro Ivy Odom. I love the addition of the hamburger bun croutons. How fun is that?

Get The Recipe
20 of 35

Beefy Skillet Lasagna

A jar of marinara sauce and your cast-iron skillet help get this classic comfort food dinner on the table with so much less hassle.

Get The Recipe
21 of 35

Beef Tamale Pie

A golden corn muffin crust studded with jalapeno slices makes for beautiful presentation with this easy skillet supper.

Get The Recipe
22 of 35

Beef Stew with Cheddar Biscuits

This new take on beef stew utilizes ground beef instead of stew meat. The real treat is the topping of homemade cheesy biscuits.

Get The Recipe
23 of 35

Instant Pot Baked Ziti

We love when our Instant Pot can recreate old-school favorites in less time, like this meaty, comforting pasta supper.

Get The Recipe
24 of 35

Meatloaf Casserole

Like a Southern twist on Shepherds Pie, this oh-so-cozy casserole was made for easy, slow Sunday suppers.

Get The Recipe
25 of 35

Muffin Tin Meatloaf

The original Sunday dinner got the cutest makeover with this recipe thats easy to serve and will liven up the kids plates.

Get The Recipe
26 of 35

Lasagna Soup

We combined an old pasta night favorite with the coziness of a soup in this new classic recipe. Solid soup will be a regular in my rotation, wrote one five-star reviewer. Great with a nice, toasty baguette!

Get The Recipe
27 of 35

Slow-Cooker Salisbury Steak

If theres one dinner that will remind you of Sundays at Grandmas, its Salisbury Steak. Paired with a heaping serving of buttery mashed potatoes, this supper is comfort on a plate. 

Get The Recipe
28 of 35

Tamale Casserole

Our Test Kitchen pros gave this easy casserole recipe high praise: "This is basically chili baked with cornbread on top, which is the best thing ever."

Get The Recipe
29 of 35

Easy Pastitsio

We made the preparation for this Greek lasagna even easier than traditional recipes with the Southern casserole treatment.

Get The Recipe
30 of 35

Swedish Meatballs

This oh-so-comforting recipe is delicious served over egg noodles for a hearty dinner. Add a simple side salad for a complete meal.

Get The Recipe
31 of 35

Church Supper Spaghetti

The name really says it all here: If the recipe is good enough for the church ladies, its good enough for us.

Get The Recipe
32 of 35

Mini Meatloaves

We included our easy Buttery Peas recipe along with these quick Mini Meatloaves for a full, filling dinner.

Get The Recipe
33 of 35

Husbands Delight

This vintage recipe with a cheeky name just might become Sunday tradition in your family.

Get The Recipe
34 of 35

Million Dollar Spaghetti

Reviewers cant get enough of this creamy spaghetti casserole. Loved it. The cream cheese and ricotta made this exceptional, wrote one five-star reviewer. Definitely a keeper!

Get The Recipe
35 of 35

Southern Meatloaf

We added diced pimientos to your usual meatloaf recipe to give it a bit of Southern flair. Then, we upgraded the traditional ketchup sauce on top to reflect more of a Southern barbecue sauce.

Get The Recipe
